episodes.title: Moonshine River
episodes.plot: The Simpsons go back to New York City so that Bart can find his old girlfriend Mary Spuckler. Meanwhile, Lisa and Marge spend the trip trying to take in New York culture on the cheap.

episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XXIII
episodes.plot: A black hole threatens to swallow Springfield, Homer tries to find the source of paranormal activity, and a "Back to the Future" parody in which Bart keeps Marge from marrying Homer.

episodes.title: Adventures in Baby-Getting
episodes.plot: Marge decides that she wants another baby, but Homer doesn't want one. Meanwhile, Bart tries to figure out where Lisa is secretly going after school.

episodes.title: Gone Abie Gone
episodes.plot: Homer invests Lisa's college fund on an online poker site. Meanwhile Abe disappears from the Springfield Retirement Castle.

episodes.title: Penny-Wiseguys
episodes.plot: Fat Tony has to serve jury duty, and his clerk, Dan, must run the mafia while he's gone. Meanwhile, Lisa considers making a disgusting change to her diet.

episodes.title: A Tree Grows in Springfield
episodes.plot: Homer becomes addicted to his new tablet computer. But when it is destroyed Homer becomes despondent, until he finds and provides hope for Springfield in the most unlikely place.

episodes.title: The Day the Earth Stood Cool
episodes.plot: Homer befriends a hipster and invites his family to move in next door. However, their friendship soon sours as Springfield is transformed into a haven for "coolness."

episodes.title: To Cur with Love
episodes.plot: When Homer shows no remorse over almost losing Santa's Little Helper, Grandpa tells everyone the story of Homer's childhood dog.

episodes.title: Homer Goes to Prep School
episodes.plot: Homer joins the "Springfield Preppers," an off-the-grid survivalist group whose leader has set up a top-secret retreat outside of town to prepare for the end of the world.

episodes.title: A Test Before Trying
episodes.plot: The fate of Springfield Elementary rests on Bart and his test scores, and Homer finds way to make money with his own parking meter.

episodes.title: Changing of the Guardian
episodes.plot: Homer and Marge find the perfect young couple and ask them to be the guardians for the kids in case something happens to them.

episodes.title: Love Is a Many Splintered Thing
episodes.plot: Mary Spuckler returns to Springfield and begins a relationship with Bart. However, Bart treats her with disrespect.

episodes.title: Hardly Kirk-ing
episodes.plot: Bart poses Millhouse as his father so that they can do adult activities, and Homer becomes skilled at finding lost objects thanks to Highlights magazine.

episodes.title: Gorgeous Grampa
episodes.plot: Homer's obsession with the TV show "Storage Battles" leads the family to discover Grampa's past identity as "Gorgeous Godfrey," the most feared, villainous man in pro-wrestling history

episodes.title: Black-Eyed, Please
episodes.plot: Ned gets fed up with Homer and punches him in the eye, and Lisa is a bullying victim from her new substitute teacher.

episodes.title: Dark Knight Court
episodes.plot: When Bart is accused of a prank he says he didn't commit, Lisa is forced to defend him in youth court, with former attorney general Janet Reno serving as judge.

episodes.title: What Animated Women Want
episodes.plot: Homer contemplates his next move after getting in the doghouse with Marge, while Millhouse's new Stanley Kowalski-inspired persona makes him suddenly attractive to Lisa.

episodes.title: Pulpit Friction
episodes.plot: Springfield gets a bedbug scare, the new assistant pastor at church appoints Homer as a deacon, and Marge loses her wedding dress.

episodes.title: Whiskey Business
episodes.plot: A new makeover could put Moe in a position to make big money, Bart fails at his job of taking care of Grandpa, and Lisa fights the shameless exploitation of Bleeding Gums Murphy's likeness.

episodes.title: The Fabulous Faker Boy
episodes.plot: Bart takes piano lessons from a cute Russian girl, Marge tries to teach the girl's father how to drive, and Homer loses the last of his hair.

episodes.title: The Saga of Carl
episodes.plot: Homer, Moe, Lenny and Carl win the lottery, but Carl steals the ticket and leaves with the money for Iceland.

episodes.title: Dangers on a Train
episodes.plot: When Marge tries to buy Homer snack cakes for their anniversary, she winds up meeting a married man who shares a common love of British television.
